title: The US Government Takes a Bigger Role in Corporate America and Policing Food Assistance
description: What happens when the government steps up its ownership of private companies and cuts back on its food assistance programs.
content: What happens when the government steps up its ownership of private companies and cuts back on its food assistance programs.
